SetupTraits.Name: Valuables
SetupTraits.Description: If fighting Naiads, place 3 valuable tokens on the battlefield and each Naiad carries 1 valuable token. Valuables are intangible tokens that can be picked up by any character by moving over their space. Characters drop them when defeated, or can drop them voluntarily as 1 action. At the end of an expedition, all characters gain 1 dust for every 2 valuables tokens the party has as a whole.

Actions.Name: Bait
Actions.Description: Place one of their carried valuable tokens on an adjacent unoccupied space.

Interrupts.Name: Ensnare
Interrupts.Description: When a hostile character picks up a valuable token in range 3, the Naiad can dash 2. Then, if theyâ€™re adjacent to the character, they deal light physical damage.
